projects.title: Modern 3D Portfolio
projects.description: A modern 3D portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Three.js. Features interactive 3D elements, smooth animations, and responsive design. Showcases full-stack capabilities with modern frontend technologies and optimized performance.

projects.title: Chatrio - AI Chatbot Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive full-stack SaaS platform that enables users to create AI-powered chatbots by crawling website URLs. Features advanced web crawling, document processing, embeddable widgets, and enterprise-grade security. Built with modern full-stack technologies including Next.js 14, TypeScript, Prisma, and ChromaDB.

projects.title: PngFy Pro - AI Powered Background Removal
projects.description: A professional-grade background removal application with a modern frontend interface and robust backend API. Features real-time image processing, user authentication, and cloud storage integration. Demonstrates full-stack development with Node.js, Express.js, and modern frontend technologies.

projects.title: üåç HiLink ‚Äì Travel Web App
projects.description: A sleek, modern, and responsive travel website built using Next.js and TypeScript. Features interactive maps, booking functionality, and a beautiful user interface. Showcases frontend expertise with modern design patterns and responsive development.
